name: Slay
description: Slay is a turn based strategy game where your goal is to conquer the island by buying men and using them to capture your enemies' hexagons. By combining two men you can create a single more powerful man who is able to kill weaker men.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Any Memory: 80 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: Any
